comment._content: She looks more like a legal eagle up at the Kings Inns!  Very good shot though.

comment._content: The quality of mercy is not strained.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/la_belle_province] "... It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven, upon the place beneath. It is twice blest: it blesseth him that gives and him that takes ..."
